name: Factory Pub
description: A charming little pub that doubles up as a refined metals factory.\nIt can't be boosted by Experimentation Labs, though.

upgrades.name: Optimized Temperature Curve
upgrades.description: The factory works faster and uses one less stone per unit of refined metal produced.

modes.name: Firmware Modding
modes.description: The factory will work 50% faster, but also use one more stone per unit of refined metal produced.

modes.name: Disable Factory
modes.description: The factory will fully halt production and not use any stone.
